landingAim.cTool: A tool that will enable to organize different groups and associations efficiently. A tool encrypted, free, open-source, taking aim at the 'horizontality'in the management of project.
landingAim.dFreeNetwork: Allow users and projects to share their resources in order to create a big free and non-commercial network.
landingAim.dOfSystD: Creation of interfaces to do a meeting place through different projects: Search geolocated by skills-interests, encrypted instant messaging, shared blog, etc...
landingAim.developFreeNetwork: Develop a free and sharing network
landingAim.doOfSystemD: Make System-D the social network of free exchange project.
landingAim.createTool: Create a tool to manage project opened to everybody.
landingAim.purpose: Develop a tool to support transition from a money society collapsing to a model based on the free exchange, the sharing and the collaboration between humans.

deleteProject.deleteProjectErrorTips: There is still members in this project
deleteProject.deleteProjectInfo: You will remove definitely this project

landingRoadmap.p7firstPhase: List of ergonomics tasks for each project.
landingRoadmap.pfirstPhase: Interface to make user account and connection to platform.
landingRoadmap.p2thirdPhase: Interface to list shared materials assets.
landingRoadmap.psecondPhase: Interface to select his skills for each users.
landingRoadmap.p8firstPhase: Interface to support or participate at System-D
landingRoadmap.p2secondPhase: Interface to select his interests for each users.
landingRoadmap.p4thirdPhase: Possibility to make advertisements for personals and projects requirements.
landingRoadmap.pthirdPhase: Taking in consideration issues and improvements.
landingRoadmap.p4firstPhase: Invitation for projects and to manage members.
landingRoadmap.p4secondPhase: Advanced research tools to research potentials contributors / interesting projects.

landingTools.pforum: Communicate together, by themes or not.
landingTools.pcalendar: To plan with your group the next events of your project.
landingTools.ptaskList: To see the progress of the project and to select tasks interactively by the participants.
landingTools.pmodularTools: Interactive map, planning in agile method, and others tools will develop.
landingTools.psimpleTools: user friendly organization tools and encrypted content for optimum privacy.

layout.betaExplain: You can probably find bugs or unusable/improvable features. We strive to make the user experience as enjoyable as possible despite very limited means (a volunteer developer helped occasionally by his friends).
layout.betaVersion: System-D.org is still in a beta version!
layout.betaWarning: The encryption protocol has been carefully designed to ensure the optimal protection of your data. That said, it has still not benefit from either in-depth expertise or penetration tests by experimented hackers.
layout.betaWarning2: The privacy and encryption of the users data is a priority for us. However, we can not guarantee the inviolability of the data for our users. You should keep this in mind
layout.help: Report a vulnerability or a security problem...
layout.betaExplainEnd: and sending us the bugs you found or remarks about existing features and ideas for improvement.

signinContainer.psignin: System-D offers you a free collaborative workspace and totally
signinContainer.p3-2signin: of his users: neither email required or personal information. However we will not be able
signinContainer.p3-3signin: to help you if you forget your password.
signinContainer.p2signin: Like Telegram or Signal, only you and the other project members will be able to decrypt and read the content you post. Even developers won't have access to your data.

donate.next1: Instant chats between users, users and projects, projects.
donate.sustain: To sustain and improve the features of System-D, make them accessible to a large amount of users, and take into account the users feedbacks.
donate.develop: To create new features. Our todo list :
donate.ponctualInfo: Send one-time donation on our Paypal account :
donate.whyText: System-D project has been made with heart, on free time. If you want it to continue and offer more free time  to the persons who make it alive for develop new features and improve the existing ones, your donations are significant.
donate.donateIn: Send a donation on the System-D wallet
donate.servers: To pay the hosting cost of the platform for an always increasing number of user
donate.recursiveInfo: Give a little money every month to System-D to sustain its long-term development with the LiberaPay open-source and free platform :
donate.title: Support System-D
donate.next2: Allow users to search a project or an user by localization, skills, interests, type of activity.
